name: 达尼·罗森伯格
awards: 2024年 第81届威尼斯电影节 地平线单元奖 最佳影片 (提名) 狗和人
2023年 第76届洛迦诺国际电影节 金豹奖 最佳影片 (提名) 消失的士兵
name_full: 达尼·罗森伯格 Dani Rosenberg

last_movies.title: THE GOSPEL ACCORDING TO MY FATHER

introduction: Born in Tel Aviv. Graduated the "Sam Spiegel Film School-Jerusalem" in 2006. He currently develops his debut feature film "The Thin Soldier".(July August Productions). In 2011 he produced and directed the short documentary film "Susya" (together with Yoav Gross) and also was the cinematographer and editor of the film. "Susya" was shown an the official competition of Berlin International Film Festival , IDFA, HotDocs , SilverDocs and in many more. During 2007-2008 he directed the medium length film "Homeland" that was featured at the Israeli Cinematheques and around the world. His short fiction films where shown in numerous international festivals including Berlinale (Susya- 2011, Don Quixote in Jerusalem- 2005), Cannes-Cinéfondation(2004- a part of the "Border Project", Clermond-Ferrand, Oberhausen and Fipa-Biarritz (The Red Toy) and awarded number of prizes, among them a Special Mention at the Berlinale official competition for "Don Quixote in Jerusalem" and many more.
